mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT external_id userId FROM dreamsearch.external_match

/* select kakao n daisy */ SELECT CASE WHEN a.userid LIKE ('%kakao%') THEN 'kakao' WHEN a.userid LIKE ('%daisy%') THEN 'daisy' END scriptUserId , a.no scriptNo FROM dreamsearch.media_script a WHERE a.userid IN('kakao','mkakao', 'daisy','mdaisy')

/* select media info */ SELECT a.no scriptNo , a.userid scriptUserId, a.w_type platform, a.s_type product, a.ad_type type , ifnull(EPRS_REST_RATE, 100)EPRS_REST_RATE, LPAD(b.scate,2,'0') mediaTpCode , CASE WHEN a.userid IN('kakao', 'mkakao') THEN '03' WHEN a.userid IN('agooglemedia', 'googlemedia', 'mgooglemedia') THEN '04' WHEN a.userid IN('igaworks', 'igaworks02','igaworksm','igaworksp') THEN '08' WHEN a.userid IN('rtbmobon') THEN '10' ELSE '01' END itlTpCode FROM dreamsearch.media_script a LEFT JOIN dreamsearch.media_site b ON a.mediasite_no=b.no WHERE a.NO=#{scriptNo}
/* 키그룹 조회하기 : ClickView */ SELECT CODE_VAL-1 scriptNo FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE a WHERE a.CODE_TP_ID='HH_TP_CODE' AND CODE_VAL BETWEEN 1 AND 10

/* 코드변환 */ SELECT CODE_VAL K, CODE_ID FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE WHERE CODE_TP_ID = 'ADVRTS_TP_CODE' UNION ALL SELECT CODE_ID K, CODE_ID FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE WHERE CODE_TP_ID = 'ADVRTS_TP_CODE'

SELECT a.CODE_ID , REPLACE( SUBSTRING( SUBSTRING_INDEX(CODE_VAL, ',' , ROW) , CHAR_LENGTH( SUBSTRING_INDEX(CODE_VAL, ',', ROW - 1) ) + 1 ) , ',', '' ) CODE_VAL FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_VAL , ROUND( ( LENGTH(CODE_VAL) - LENGTH( REPLACE ( CODE_VAL, ',', '') ) ) / LENGTH(',') )+1 AS cnt FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE WHERE CODE_TP_ID = #{CODE_TP_ID} AND USE_YN='Y' )a, ( SELECT CODE_VAL ROW FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE WHERE CODE_TP_ID LIKE '%HH_TP_CODE%' )b WHERE b.ROW BETWEEN 1 AND a.cnt ORDER BY 1, ROW

SELECT A.CODE_ID, C.CODE_VAL FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE A, dreamsearch.MOBON_ADVRTS_PRDT_MPG_INFO B, dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE C WHERE A.CODE_ID = B.ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE AND C.CODE_ID = B.ADVRTS_MPG_TP_CODE AND A.CODE_TP_ID = 'ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE' AND C.CODE_TP_ID='ADVRTS_MPG_TP_CODE'

SELECT DISTINCT SITE_CODE siteCode, KPI_NO kpiNo FROM ( SELECT IAD.SITE_CODE, IAD.KPI_NO FROM dreamsearch.iadsite AS IAD WHERE IAD.SITE_CODE= CONVERT(#{siteCode} USING EUCKR) UNION ALL SELECT AD.SITE_CODE, AD.KPI_NO FROM dreamsearch.adsite AS AD WHERE AD.SITE_CODE= CONVERT(#{siteCode} USING EUCKR) )A
